string.name: rules
string.li: There will be 6 teams of six members each.
Teams will be divided into two groups.
Out of six players, only 4 players will take part in each round.
The games will be played on Lichess and the username should be in the format – “ Name_Surname21”
Every team will have a girl player and it will be compulsory for her to play and girls will compete with girls.
Every member of the team must be given one chance to play in the group stage match otherwise he will not be allowed to play in semifinals and finals.
Matches of each team will be arranged according to the chit-system.
The time control for group stage matches will be 7+0. and the matches will be played in round-robin format.
Every team must be available 15 minutes before the start of the match.
If any player fails to join within 5 minutes of the start time of their match, then the opponent will get a bye.
Top 2 teams will qualify for the semifinals from each groups.
The teams at position 2 and position 3 of each group will have a knock-out round and the winner will proceed to semifinals.
In case of a draw in semifinals and finals, there will be a Armageddon match with randomly selected team member.
In case of a draw in semifinals and finals, there will be a Armageddon match with randomly selected team member.
Time control for semifinals and finals will be a surprise and might have increment.
No one should use any unfair means since all the matches will be verified on lichess and the games will be proctored.
All fide rules will be followed.
There will be cash prizes for the winner, the runners up,best player, emerging player.
All the matches will be streamed live on IIIT Ranchi Chess Team’s official Youtube channel.
If anyone got any problem with their team captain, they can contact to Vice Captain of the Chess team.
Make sure to have a stable Internet Connection failing which will result the opponent given a bye.
